flawed_nl_solution:
In one week he will have saved 20+10=<<20+10=30>>30 dollars
In two weeks he will have saved 30+10=<<30+10=40>>40 dollars
In three weeks he will have saved 40+10=<<40+10=50>>50 dollars
At the end of week four, he will have saved 50+10=<<50+10=90>>90 dollars

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
